meanings.definition: Display or show (a quality or feeling) clearly
meanings.sent2: His hard work manifests in his excellent grades.
meanings.sent3: The excitement of the puppy manifests in its wagging tail.
meanings.sent4: The beauty of the sunset manifests in its vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The pride of the team manifests in their victory dance.

meanings.definition: A list of passengers or cargo on a ship or plane
meanings.sent1: The captain checked the manifest before departure.
meanings.sent2: The manifest showed the names of all passengers.
meanings.sent3: The manifest revealed the weight of the cargo.
meanings.sent4: The manifest listed the items for delivery.
meanings.sent5: The manifest indicated the number of passengers on board.

meanings.definition: A document listing the contents of a shipment
meanings.sent1: The warehouse manager prepared the manifest for the shipment.
meanings.sent2: The manifest detailed each item in the package.
meanings.sent3: The manifest was carefully checked for accuracy.
meanings.sent4: The manifest included a description of the goods.
meanings.sent5: The manifest was signed by the sender for confirmation.
